Output

Options
TypeChoiceTYPEAvailable Choices: [0] Lines [1] Rectangles Default: 0
WidthValue rangeEXTENT_X
HeightValue rangeEXTENT_Y
Division WidthFloating pointDIVISION_XMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 10.000000
Division HeightFloating pointDIVISION_YMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 10.000000
AlignmentChoiceALIGNMENTDetermines how the graticule is aligned to the extent, if division sizes do not fit.Available Choices: [0] bottom-left [1] top-left [2] bottom-right [3] top-right [4] centered Default: 0
(*) optional
